visualization_prompt: Generate a line chart showing monthly performance metrics with zone-based styling using Highcharts zoneAxis and dashStyle
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains 12 monthly observations of a single performance metric, forming a univariate time series. Synthetic data follows realistic business patterns: Q2-Q3 growth (μ=143.6, σ=31.2) followed by Q4 decline, with August peak at 216.4. The zone split at September (index 8) creates distinct measurement/prognosis phases. The line chart maximizes data-ink ratio by eliminating redundant gridlines while maintaining Cairo's principle of proportional ink. The dotted red prognosis zone (value >8) uses preattentive color and texture cues for immediate pattern recognition. Numerical anchors (176.0 summer dip, 216.4 peak) provide cognitive reference points, with marker symbols emphasizing key data nodes.
